scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Executing pre-publish stuffs..' && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean-build && npm run lint && tsc && npm run copy-json
scripts.lint: prettier --use-tabs --single-quote --tab-width 4 --write src/**/* typings/**/* tests/**/* && tslint -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.json -t stylish --fix src/**/*
scripts.lint-noFix: prettier --use-tabs --single-quote --tab-width 4 src/**/* typings/**/* tests/**/* && tslint -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.json -t stylish src/**/*
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/ --compilers ts:ts-node/register,tsx:ts-node/register --recursive --reporter spec
scripts.test-watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/ --compilers ts:ts-node/register,tsx:ts-node/register --recursive --reporter spec --watch
